node.statement: 4x4 S matrix construction (eq 2.37): S_{ij} = (1/(1+xi^2)) * M where M = [[1, xi^2, xi, xi], [xi^2, 1, -xi, -xi], [xi, -xi, -1, xi^2], [xi, -xi, xi^2, -1]]. Derived from the S-transform Z_i^{jk}(-1/u) = sum_m F^{ijk*}_{i*j*m} Z_j^{i*m}(u) applied to the projector decomposition, using completeness.
